content:
The Aizik Langsam Family


Some background email from the family can be found here.

Aizik Langsam had two known children.

  • Yakov (Yenkekle) married and had at least one child with his first wife Zipora (Feige). She was born in Lancut and her family name was Landau. She passed away in 1909. Yakov then married Sima Felner and they lived in Dembow, Poland
    • Yafa was born in 1907 in Przeworsk, Poland. Her mother passed away when Yafa was only 2 years old. When she was 12, she was sent to live in Germany. In the end of 1933 she left Germany and came to Israel in January 1934. Zipi Schagrin
  • Zalman was married to Faiga. He was born in Kanczuga, Poland and moved to Przeworsk.
    • Dov was born in 1904. He had one known son.
    • Avner (changed his surname to Shalev)



Some background email from the family can be found here.


I would be very interested to hear from anyone with knowledge or an interest in the Miller family.

Moishe Miller
moishe@langsam.com

My home address is
           1374 East 28th Street
           Brooklyn NY 11210-5311
           USA

Last updated 9/20/2017
